Uses of Package
main.java.de.bsi.seapi

  • Packages that use main.java.de.bsi.seapi 
    Package Description
    main.java.de.bsi.seapi  
    main.java.de.bsi.seapi.holdertypes  
    main.java.de.bsi.tsesimulator.tse  
  • Classes in main.java.de.bsi.seapi used by main.java.de.bsi.seapi 
    Class and Description
    SEAPI.AuthenticationResult
    Represents the result of an authentication The value ok SHALL indicate that the authentication has been successful.
    SEAPI.SyncVariants
    Represents the variants that are supported by the Secure Element to update the current date/time.
    SEAPI.UnblockResult
    Represents the result of the unblock process.
    SEAPI.UpdateVariants
    Represents the variants that are supported by the Secure Element to update transactions.
  • Classes in main.java.de.bsi.seapi used by main.java.de.bsi.seapi.holdertypes 
    Class and Description
    SEAPI.AuthenticationResult
    Represents the result of an authentication The value ok SHALL indicate that the authentication has been successful.
    SEAPI.SyncVariants
    Represents the variants that are supported by the Secure Element to update the current date/time.
    SEAPI.UnblockResult
    Represents the result of the unblock process.
    SEAPI.UpdateVariants
    Represents the variants that are supported by the Secure Element to update transactions.
  • Classes in main.java.de.bsi.seapi used by main.java.de.bsi.tsesimulator.tse 
    Class and Description
    SEAPI
    This interface defines the functions that are provided by the Secure Element API (SE API) version 1.0.1

    The following functions were modified by the author of the TSE-Simulator due to demands (throwing exception when signature and/or transaction counter(s) would overflow made by BSI TR-03153:
    short initialize(String description) short initialize() short updateTime(ZonedDateTime newDateTime) short updateTime() short disableSecureElement() short startTransaction(String clientId, byte[] processData, String processType, byte[] additionalData, LongHolder transactionNumber, ZonedDateTimeHolder logTime, ByteArrayHolder serialNumber, LongHolder signatureCounter, ByteArrayHolder signatureValue) short updateTransaction(String clientId, long transactionNumber, byte[] processData, String processType, ZonedDateTimeHolder logTime, ByteArrayHolder signatureValue, LongHolder signatureCounter) short finishTransaction(String clientId, long transactionNumber, byte[] processData, String processType, byte[] additionalData, ZonedDateTimeHolder logTime, ByteArrayHolder signatureValue, LongHolder signatureCounter) short authenticateUser(String userId, byte[] pin, AuthenticationResultHolder authenticationResult, ShortHolder remainingRetries) short logOut(String userId) short unblockUser(String userId, byte[] puk, byte[] newPin, UnblockResultHolder unblockResult)
    The following functions were modified by the author of the TSE-Simulator to allow throwing ErrorParameterMismatch, which is expected for all exportData functions by TR-03151.
